About.heading: Creating websites that deliver results
About.subheading: We combine modern technologies with thoughtful design to make your website stand out from the competition
About.description1: First, we need to thoroughly understand your business - its strengths, vision, approach to customers, and unique selling points against competition. We'll analyze the market, check what works for others, and select the best solutions for you. The target audience is also crucial - it determines whether the site should be modern and dynamic, or classic and serious.
About.description2: AI Chatbot for appointment booking? Newsletter system for promotional updates? Contact form, blog with customer tips? Or maybe an application that will replace Excel and automate company processes?
About.description3:
Together, we'll find the best solutions that will make your company set the trends, and competitors will start copying your ideas.
Don't believe it? Check it out!

Portfolio.subheading: Meet some of our projects that helped clients increase their online visibility and conversion

Timeline.heading: Cooperation process step by step
Timeline.subheading: Clear cooperation plan from contact to project completion

step1.title: Contact and Needs Analysis
step1.content: Contact us via form, phone, or email. We'll discuss your business, goals, and expectations. Share materials (photos, logo, colors, sections) so we can better understand your needs and recommend the best solutions.

step2.title: Pricing and Planning
step2.content: Based on the collected information, we'll prepare a quote and project schedule. After cost approval, we create an action strategy and website structure, defining key functions and elements that will support your business goals.

step3.title: Content and Layout Preparation
step3.content: We'll present content and layout proposals tailored to your brand and business goals. At this stage, you can provide feedback and suggestions that we'll incorporate before starting website construction.

step4.title: Development and Optimization
step4.content: We execute the project, creating a responsive, fast, and optimized website. We ensure its performance, SEO, and proper functioning across all devices.

step5.title: Testing and Deployment
step5.content: We thoroughly check every element of the site â€“ forms, links, functionalities. After your final approval, we deploy the site to the server, configure email and analytics tools.

step6.title: Post-Launch Support
step6.content: After launch, we offer technical support and development opportunities to ensure your website always meets expectations.

CTA.title: Ready for a new website that attracts customers?
CTA.description: Start transforming your online presence today! Consultations are free.

Faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subheading: Learn more about our work, website development process and benefits

Question1.question: Why do we use Next.js?
Question1.answer: Next.js is a modern technology that ensures excellent SEO optimization and high performance. Websites built with Next.js load instantly and are better indexed by Google. Additionally, maintenance costs are minimal because sites can run on free Vercel hosting â€“ a platform created by Next.js developers.

Question2.question: What additional costs may occur?
Question2.answer:
• - Domain (website name): approx. $4.99/year
  • - Hosting is available on Vercel for free
  • - Business email (optional): approx. $5.99/year with our recommended provider Hostinger

Question3.question: How long does it take to create a website?
Question3.answer: Development time depends on the chosen package. A simple website can be ready in 5-7 business days, while more complex projects take 7 to 30 days. The speed of implementation also depends on the delivery of materials by the client.

Question4.question: Can I edit the website content myself?
Question4.answer: Absolutely! However, remember to request this feature during the project estimation phase. The Content Management System (CMS) is available in the "Premium Solution" package and allows for easy editing of texts, images, and other website elements without any programming knowledge.

Question5.question: Will my website be visible in Google?
Question5.answer: Yes, all our websites are SEO optimized, which increases their visibility in search engines and improves rankings.

Question6.question: Can I add additional features to the website?
Question6.answer: Yes, you can order additional features such as multilingual support, business email configuration, dark/light mode, blog, testimonials module, newsletter, AI chatbot, or e-commerce functionality.

Question7.question: How much does a website cost?
Question7.answer: The price depends on the chosen package and project complexity. Simple landing pages start from $349$, while more advanced projects start from $549$. For sophisticated solutions, the price is determined individually.

Question8.question: What rights will I have to the website after project completion?
Question8.answer: After project completion, you receive full rights to the website and code, as well as all necessary access credentials.

UnderPressure.title: Under Pressure
UnderPressure.shortDescription: After 6 months, the website ranked 1st in Google results for many key phrases.

projectDescription.title: Project Description
projectDescription.content: We created a modern and functional website for Under Pressure, a company specializing in professional pressure washing. Our goal was to design a website that not only reflects the company's professionalism and experience but also provides users with easy access to information about the services offered.

design.title: Design
design.description: The website design is based on a minimalist aesthetic with contrasting colors that highlight the company's professional character. A clear content layout and intuitive navigation allow users to quickly find the information they need. Additionally, the use of high-quality graphics generated with artificial intelligence and iconography related to pressure washing services enhances the site's visual appeal.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: The website was built with maximum performance and responsiveness in mind. We implemented advanced technical solutions such as lazy loading of images and SEO optimization. The site looks excellent on all devices, from smartphones to large desktop screens.

features.title: Features
features.description: The website includes a range of modern features, such as a dynamic text animation in the hero section, a photo gallery, a contact form, two interactive maps, and search engine optimization. All these elements work together to create an effective marketing tool.

UnderPressure.description: Professional website for a pressure washing company

Google-position-1.title: Google Position #1
Google-position-1.description: After 6 months from implementation, the website achieved the first position in Google for key phrases related to pressure washing in the region. Optimized content and site structure contributed to a significant increase in organic traffic.

Google-position-2.title: Google Dominance
Google-position-2.description: Consistently maintaining top positions, right after sponsored positions, translates into a steady flow of new customers. The site ranks at the top for many phrases related to cleaning paving stones, facades, and roofs.

SEO.title: Under Pressure - Professional Pressure Washing | Portfolio
SEO.description: See how we helped Under Pressure achieve first position in Google. Effective website for a pressure washing company.
SEO.ogTitle: Under Pressure - Case Study | NextGen Sites
SEO.ogDescription: See how we created a website that reached #1 in Google for key pressure washing phrases within 6 months.
